task.title: How to Add an Additional Administrator on LinkedIn
task.shortdesc: A current administrator may add an additional administrator to a company LinkedIn page should a new employee need access to the page.

taskbody.prereq: You need to be connected with the person you would like to add as an adminstrator in order to be successful.

step.cmd: Open the LinkedIn homepage on a web browser, navigate to the company page and click "Settings".
Type in the name of the LinkedIn user (name of the new hire) that you are adding as an administrator.
Assign their role as "Super Admin" and then press save.
Alert the new hire that they have been added as an administrator and they may complete the rest of the required instructions.
